CustomField.formula: ROUND( IF( AND( SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Billing_360_Transaction__c, Prorated_Amount__c > 0, ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, 'Direct Quarterly') ), Prorated_Amount__c, Quarterly_Payment__c ) + Estimated_Upfront_Amount__c + S_H_Tax__c + IF( ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_NEW__c), 0, Hardware_Sales_Tax__c + IF( AND( SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Billing_360_Transaction__c, Prorated_Amount__c > 0, ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, 'Direct Quarterly') ), Prorated_Amount_with_Tax__c - Prorated_Amount__c, Quarterly_License_Tax__c ) + IF(Shipping_and_Handling__c = 99999.99, 0, Shipping_and_Handling__c ) ) - IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Finance_Partner__c, ""),ISBLANK(Finance_Partner_Account__c)),Competitor_Buyout_Amount__c - Buyout_Sales_Tax__c,0) + ABS(IF(ISPICKVAL(Is_Installation_Reimbursable__c, 'Yes'),Total_Estimated_Installation_Costs__c,0)) - IF(Future_Free_Months_Amount__c > 0,Future_Free_Months_Amount__c - Free_Service_Sales_Tax__c,0) - IF(OTD_Amt__c > 0, OTD_Amt__c - OTD_Sales_Tax__c, 0),2)
CustomField.label: First Quarter Payment
